csg.Vector¶

class csg.Vector(*args)¶

Bases: object

class Vector

Represents a 3D vector.

Example usage:
Vector(1, 2, 3); Vector([1, 2, 3]); Vector({ ‘x’: 1, ‘y’: 2, ‘z’: 3 });
